text: A gubernatorial election was held on 7 April 2019 to elect the next Governor of Fukuoka. == Candidates == *Hirochi Ogawa* back by the local LDP, Komeito. *Kazuhisa Takeuchi, back by the national LDP. *Kiyoshi Shinoda, back by the JCP. == Results == https://www.fukuoka-now.com/en/news/hiroshi-ogawa-wins-re- election-as-governor-of-fukuoka-prefecture/ == References == Category:2019 elections in Japan Category:Gubernatorial elections in Japan Category:April 2019 events in Japan Category:Politics of Fukuoka Prefecture
title: 2019 Fukuoka gubernatorial election
